title: Court in Montenegro Approves Do Kwon’s Extradition to the US or South Korea
description: A court in Montenegro’s capital, Podgorica, approved Do Kwon, the founder of the Terra ecosystem, extradition to either South Korea or the United States. Montenegro’s Minister of Justice will decide which country Kwon goes to.

title: LG and UNESCO Join Forces to Promote Ethical AI Development
description: LG AI Research, the artificial intelligence think tank of LG Group, has entered into a landmark partnership with UNESCO in Seoul, signing a letter of intent to collectively advance knowledge and awareness of the ethical dimensions of artificial intelligence (AI). This groundbreaking collaboration is the first of its kind, with UNESCO joining forces with a ... Read more

title: Microsoft Emerges as the Big Winner Amid Chaos at OpenAI
description: The recent turmoil at OpenAI, the developer behind ChatGPT, made headlines not only for its internal struggles but also for its impact on tech giant Microsoft, a major investor in the company. Microsoft’s shares initially took a hit when OpenAI fired and then rehired its CEO, Sam Altman. However, in a surprising turn of events, ... Read more

title: WISE 11 Summit to Explore the AI Horizon in Education with 2000 Stakeholders
description: The World Innovation Summit for Education, WISE 11, is poised to assemble over 2000 stakeholders and 100 experts from local, regional, and international spheres. Taking center stage at the Qatar National Convention Centre from November 28-29, the summit will delve into the dynamic realm of artificial intelligence (AI) in education, exploring its potential and associated ... title: Scholarships: Applying Today is a Breeze with this AI Tool
description: Explore the game-changing Scholarply AI tool, transforming scholarships for students.

title: Japanese Farms Embrace AI-based Robots for Efficient Harvests
description: In a pioneering move that could redefine the agricultural landscape in Japan, AI-based robots are taking center stage on large-scale farms. Faced with severe manpower shortages, producers are turning to innovative solutions that promise to revolutionize the way crops are cultivated and harvested.  Venture businesses are at the forefront of this technological wave, introducing AI-equipped ... Read more

title: BTCPay Server Introduces Seamless POS Bitcoin Vouchers
description:
This exciting development enables users to print vouchers, complete with a QR code, directly from their Point of Sale (POS) machines. These vouchers streamline the process of purchasing Bitcoin with a credit or debit card. Making it remarkably accessible and user-friendly. A Gateway to Bitcoin Accessibility Bitcoin has often been associated with a complex acquisition […]

title: Optimism’s Weekly Trading Volume Surges 1500%+, Reaches $344.98M
description:
According to the latest revelations, the decentralized exchange (DEX) trading activity on Optimism, the layer 2 scaling solution built on Ethereum, has surged to the $300 million range. Colin Wu, the Chinese crypto reporter of Wu Blockchain X page, shared a post highlighting the substantial increase in the trading activity of Optimism DEX. Data from […]
